name: Thimble Box
description:
Thimble Box is a puzzle platformer where you fire projectiles when you jump. Players have to be considerate on their movement as to not destroy too much and make levels unbeatable. 

This game is currently in development. Art is done by Blake Infuso.

Controls:

Walk: Arrow keys or WASD

Jump/Shoot: Space Bar

Undo: O

Redo: P

Restart: R

Exit: ESC
